name: Pickle Recipe
instructions: Soak the mustard seeds in a little vinegar for about 30 minutes.
While waiting, wash and slice the eggplant in rounds (optionally half
circles). Rub turmeric powder and a little salt. Deep fry in cooking
oil. Remove to a colander and let it cool. Cut the red onions in
length wise. Grind the soaked mustard seeds into a fine paste. Mix
all the ingredients together. Cover up in a bowl for a short while
and it will be ready to eat. This pickle keeps well for a week or
